summary: Completed comprehensive testing of P4 Player Profile Dashboard. All 18 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend profile page with 3 tabs (Overview, History, Achievements) fully functional. Player name click navigation from ranking works correctly. i18n translations complete for ES/EN/ZH.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/superpin/players/{jugador_id}/statistics - 200 OK with full stats
Backend: Statistics returns player_info (nombre, apellido, apodo, nivel, elo_rating, fecha_registro)
Backend: Statistics returns overall_stats (total_matches, wins, losses, win_rate, sets_won, sets_lost, set_win_rate, best_streak, leagues_played)
Backend: Statistics returns league_rankings array with posicion, puntos_totales, partidos_jugados
Backend: Statistics returns match_history with opponent info, resultado, is_winner, elo_change
Backend: Statistics returns badges array with rarity
Backend: Statistics returns badge_count (total, legendary, epic, rare, common)
Backend: Statistics returns recent_form (W/L array for last 10 matches)
Backend: Carlos stats: 1W-0L, 100% win rate, 1 legendary badge
Backend: Mar√≠a stats: 0W-1L, 0% win rate, 1 epic badge
Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/superpin/players/nonexistent/statistics - Returns 404
Backend: Statistics with liga_id filter works correctly
Backend: GET /api/pinpanclub/superpin/head-to-head - Returns correct structure
Backend: Head-to-head Carlos vs Mar√≠a: Carlos 1 win, Mar√≠a 0 wins, 1 total match
Backend: Head-to-head reversed order works correctly
Backend: Head-to-head matches list contains partido_id, ganador_id, score
Backend: Head-to-head with no matches returns total_matches: 0
Backend: Head-to-head sets count: Carlos 2, Mar√≠a 1
Frontend: Ranking page loads with player names clickable
Frontend: Click on Carlos navigates to /pinpanclub/superpin/player/jugador_544167d88272
Frontend: Profile header shows name, nickname, ELO, level, registration date, badges preview
Frontend: Overview tab shows Statistics (Wins, Losses, Sets Won, Best Streak, Win Rate)
Frontend: Overview tab shows Recent Form (W/L indicators)
Frontend: Overview tab shows League Positions with ranking and points
Frontend: History tab shows Match History with opponent, result, ELO change
Frontend: Achievements tab shows badge count by rarity (Legendary, Epic, Rare, Common)
Frontend: Achievements tab shows badges with correct rarity styling (yellow=legendary, purple=epic)
Frontend: Carlos badge: üèÜ Campe√≥n de Torneo (legendary, yellow styling)
Frontend: Mar√≠a badge: ü•à Subcampe√≥n (epic, purple styling)
i18n: Spanish translations complete for superpin.profile.*
i18n: English translations complete for superpin.profile.*
i18n: Chinese translations complete for superpin.profile.*
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created. Used existing players: Carlos (jugador_544167d88272) with 1W-0L 100%, Mar√≠a (jugador_4a751551ad4b) with 0W-1L 0%.
context_for_next_testing_agent: P4 Player Profile Dashboard fully tested. Endpoints: GET /players/{id}/statistics (returns player_info, overall_stats, league_rankings, match_history, badges, recent_form, badge_count), GET /head-to-head (returns player_a, player_b, total_matches, matches). Profile page at /pinpanclub/superpin/player/:jugadorId with 3 tabs: Overview (stats, recent form, league positions), History (match history), Achievements (badges by rarity). Player names in ranking are clickable and navigate to profile. Carlos has 1 legendary badge (tournament_champion), Mar√≠a has 1 epic badge (tournament_runner_up). i18n complete for ES/EN/ZH.
